contact_points.description: Center of the lever handle grip
contact_points.usage: Primary grasp point for applying leverage. Approach along the local Z-axis (red arrow) to secure the grip. Once held, apply downward or rotational force.

functional_points.description: At the base rotation axis of the handle
functional_points.usage: Action point for opening the door. Requires pure rotation (Ï‰_y) around the longitudinal Y-axis (blue arrow). Does NOT require axial push (v_y) unless the latch is stuck.
